result.execSummary:
On one or more charges, the deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

The defendant Andrew James Widiker was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Obstructing. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andrew James Widiker

TO ALSO INCLUDE 16CM149 (PLEAS), 16CT236 (INIT) and 15TR3220 (PTC):
CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Nicholas Von Davis   DF:  Andrew James Widiker appeared. Case called at 8:51 a.m. Court notes 16CM149 is set for a plea and sentencing. Court was presented with a Diversion Agreement. Atty Davis would like to reset the initial appearance on 16CT236 to preserve any rights. ADA Ellenwood recites agreement.   Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads GUILTY to Ct's 1 & 2 in 16CM149. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct's 1 & 2 in 16CM149 and court will withhold entry of judgment per the DJOC agreement. Sentencing arguments. Court will sign agreement on todays date. Court dismisses 15TR3220. Bond to remain in effect. Atty Davis would like to conduct initial appearance in 16CT236. DE has a copy of the criminal complaint. Waives further reading. NG plea on all counts. Reservation on all pretrial motions and substitution requests for 15 days. Court will set for internal review for 30 days.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 13, 2016 at 08:30 am.

TO ALSO INCLUDE 16CM149 (FPT), 15TR6217 and 16TR200 (Court trial):
CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Nicholas Von Davis   DF:  Andrew James Widiker appeared. Case called at 10:02 a.m. Court notes the TR files are set for a court trial and 16CM149 for a final pre trial. ADA Ellenwood states there is a resolution and recites agreement. 16CM149 will be a DJOC and plea will be set on the date and time of the already scheduled jury trial. DE pleads NO CONTEST to 15TR6217 OWI 1st. Court accepts plea, finds DE guilty of 15TR6217 OWI 1st. Orders forfeiture in the amount of $987.50, 8 month drivers license revocation with credit for any administrative suspension, IID and AODA. DE to set up a payment plan. Court will dismiss 16TR200.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 13, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Final pre-trial on December 2, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Jury trial on December 13, 2016 at 08:30 am.

TO ALSO INCLUDE 16CM149, 16TR200 and 15TR6217:
CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Nicholas Von Davis   DF:  Andrew James Widiker appeared. Case called at 3:43 p.m. Court notes these matters are set for a pre trial conference. ADA Ellenwood states there is an agreement. Recites recommendations. Court can not go along with the proposed negotiations. Court will recess at 3:53 p.m. Case recalled at 3:57 p.m. Atty Davis requesting this matter be reset. Not a resolution at this time. Court would like all final pre trial submissions to be filed no later than 1 week prior to 12-02-2016  Jury trial scheduled for December 13, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for December 2, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on October 17, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Nicholas Von Davis   DF:  Andrew James Widiker appeared. Case called at 8:48 a.m. Court notes this matter is scheduled for a PTC.  Atty Davis is not intending to file motions. Waiting for an offer to be extended from the state. ADA Ellenwood makes statement. Address confirmed. Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 17, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
Signed by Def and Attorney Davis. Reviewed by RMW. km
Pre-trial conference on September 6, 2016 at 08:45 am.

INCLUDES 16CT97 and 16CM149

Prior to leaving the courthouse, report to St Croix County Jail for mugshots and fingerprints.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

CO: RMW, RPR: Erin Drost, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:  Alexis S. Mckinley,   Andrew James Widiker pro se.  Includes 16CT97 and 16CM149. Court confirms address. Court questions Defendant.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  Defendant wishes to retain counsel.  Court enters NG plea on all Cases/Counts. ADA McKinley states the 15TR3219 OWI 1st and PAC should have been dismissed and OWI was refiled as 16CT97 also asking 15TR3220 to trail. Defendant to contact Atty Davis.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 14, 2016 at 08:45 am.
